hooks.command: filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get('file_path',''))" 2>/dev/null) && [ -n "$filepath" ] && [[ "$filepath" == *.ts || "$filepath" == *.json || "$filepath" == *.md ]] && npx prettier --write "$filepath" 2>/dev/null || true

filepath=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get('file_path',''))" 2>/dev/null) && case "$filepath" in */.env|*/.env.*|*/package-lock.json) echo 'BLOCKED: do not edit .env or lock files directly.' >&2; exit 2;; esac
